Header: Update: Delay of train on Kelani Valley Railway Line continues
Content: It will take several hours to restore the train service on Kelani Valley Railway Line after a train en route to Colombo derailed, the Department of Railways stated. A spokesperson said the train derailed near the Avissawella Railway Station at around 4.55 this morning. -------------------------------------------------------- A train has derailed near the Avissawella Railway Station this morning.
